name: Size It
description:
Unfortunately, all the mechanisms in his laboratory have gone crazy, so he will have to get out of there through a huge number of obstacles. Huge saws, turrets, lasers and tons of boxes on the way! Help the scientist escape from his own laboratory. The game has thirty levels that you need to go through. Also presented are mechanics with changing the size of the scientist's body, for solving various problems on the way.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
